alert.note: Alert for Menard; Schleicher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 2:28PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN SCHLEICHER AND MENARD COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM CDT... At 228 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Menard, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Menard, Fort Mckavett, The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Ranch Road 1773, Camp Sol Mayer, The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Highway 29, and Us-83 Near The Kimble-Menard County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
